chunks.text:
Joe Nasr

 



 

De : Jay Davis <Jay.Davis@epicbrokers.com> 
Envoyé : mercredi 11 juin 2025 15:28
À : Samaroosingh, Meena <meena.gopaul@axaxl.com>
Cc : Jennifer Cortez <Jennifer.Cortez@epicbrokers.com>; Joe Nasr <joe.nasr@nascofrance.com>
Objet : **URGENT REQUEST** Christofle Silver, Inc - Update to US Insurance Program – Location 2 Coverage & Location 10 Deletion
Importance : Haute

 

Email from external sender. 

RE: Christofle Silver, Inc. – Policy# US00117078PR25A

 

Dear Meena,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

We would like to request the following urgent updates to our US insurance program based on the attached email from our Global Broker:

 

1.	Location 2 – Bal Harbour, FL
	Please add Business Interruption coverage for the location at:
	9700 Collins Ave, Ste 216, Bal Harbour, FL 33154
	The requested coverage amount is USD 500,000, effective January 1, 2025, in accordance with the landlord’s requirements.
	This is a critical matter, as the lease for this location is at risk due to insurance compliance issues. We would appreciate it if you could expedite the issuance of the addendum and certificate of insurance for the landlord.

Please forward Endorsement (& Invoice if available) as soon as the request has been processed so that we can issue a Certificate of Insurance. 

 

2.	Location 10 – Temporary Pop-Up

As per instructions from Mrs. Ellen Gu, please remove Location 10 (Address: 8430 Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069) from the policy. This was a temporary pop-up store that operated for only three months in 2024 and is no longer active.

chunks.text:
As per instructions from Mrs. Ellen Gu, please remove Location 10 (Address: 8430 Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069) from the policy. This was a temporary pop-up store that operated for only three months in 2024 and is no longer active.

 

Please confirm receipt of this request and let us know if you need any additional information to proceed.

 

Thank you very much for your prompt attention and support.

 

Warm regards,

 

 

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/tAUvC6zPJSZw7q3Umiph5v4Qz?domain=epicbrokers.com> 

Jay Davis 

Account Executive, Commercial Insurance

Entertainment & Sports | International Division

Direct: (212) 293-6030

jay.davis@​epicbrokers.​com <mailto:jay.davis@?epicbrokers.?com>

1140 Avenue of Americas, 8th Fl, New York, NY 10036

 **Certificate Requests can now be sent to: CommercialCOI@epicbrokers.com <mailto:CommercialCOI@epicbrokers.com> . Please allow for your request to be handled within 24 to 48 Hours.**
